TopicTitle: [1.6.1] Tiny Parts and Other Useless Junk

Articles.Content:
maybe the q-thruster needs its own model. problem was its so theoretical i dont think an example of the thing exists. i wouldn't know what it would look like. id probably have to do an em drive or mach effect thruster as those have actually been built, but both are somewhat boring looking. or i could just make it a scifi-ish looking thing as its probably never going to work irl.

i think you would need to go all the way back to the pre-ksp 1.0 era to find the point of best balance. i think the release that had the good thruster flames were the best balanced, but idk that may have been the one that broke everything. 

i think the tiny girder kit was more or less the same size as the stock cubic octagonal strut (though just a hair smaller), and you can get about 3 of them across one of the 0.625 parts. they are 0.171 in the modeling program and the colliders are 0.18, so with the standard 1.25 scaling ksp does that comes out to 0.225m.
Thank you to @Nuke for being so helpful and gracious with this adoption, glad I am finally able to devote the time it so richly deserves!
Thread locked at OP's request.
